name: Siren's Serenade
description:
Siren's Serenade is a game made by Matt McGill in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 33 game jam. It is based on the theme: "You are the Monster".

Ludum Dare Page

Use the power of your voice to lure ships into the rocks then consume the sailors to feed your insatiable appetite.

Sing your way through 5 story levels and try to fend off your increasing hunger for as long as possible in survival mode.

Music by Mark Sparling - http://marksparling.com/
